name: GEO Core Force
description:
Background

Welcome to 2068, generations of commercialism has left earth nearly depleted of resources. With the rise of disease and the inevitable acts of war and aggression, left Earth nearly purged of all male humans. Civilizations fell, cloning was developed, and the last of humanity reformed into primal tribes. Each warring tribe fighting for the resources for their survival...

Gameplay / Guide

One on one battles. You compete to secure enough GEO Cores to supply enough income to build your army. Then command your forces to defend your HQ while attacking the enemy HQ.

Whomever HQ is left standing wins.

Units

GUI Modes and HUD Buttons.
